EmailTemplate.subject: Chatbots Love Your Repetitive Jobs!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-chatbots.aspx?cmp=EBBSJULYBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Free Up Your Employees From Repetitive Tasks
Chatbots are designed to interact with customers quickly and efficiently, reducing high-demand work for your team. Learn how they can improve your business. I Want To Know More <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-chatbots.aspx?cmp=EBBSJULYBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
